page.topic: How to Dynamically Show "Add Records" Link
page.description: If a Grid Component can be used to add new records, the button used to display the new record rows or detail view for adding a new record can be dynamically shown or hidden.

description.p: If new records are added using a Detail View, add the following code to the click event for the Action Button:

If you wanted to hide the entire link, the <span> tag can be added around the new Record link by specifying a *[link:Custom Grid Toolbar Template@customize grid toolbar template]*. To do this, edit the *[ui:Customize Grid toolbar template]* settings in the Grid Properties. Select *[ui:Toolbar when grid is editable]* to edit the toolbar template for an editable Grid and insert the default template by clicking the *[ui:Insert default template* link. Add the span tags around the *[html:{grid.GridViewAddNewRecordHyperlink}]*. For example:
